tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo hostname swarm-node-@@{calm_array_index}@@
sudo sh -c 'echo "swarm-node-@@{calm_array_index}@@" > /etc/hostname'
sudo apt-get update
if [[ ! $(which docker) ]];then
  curl -sSL https://get.docker.com/ | sudo sh
fi
echo "DOCKER_OPTS='--cluster-store=consul://@@{calm_array_private_ip_address[0]}@@:8500 --cluster-advertise=eth0:2375 -H unix:///var/run/docker.sock -H=0.0.0.0:2375'" | sudo tee /etc/default/docker
sudo rm -f /etc/docker/key.json
sudo usermod -aG docker $(id -nu)
sudo service docker restart
sleep 10
tasks.name: InstallDocker

tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash
if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ];then
sudo docker run -d -p 8300:8300 -p 8301:8301 -p 8301:8301/udp -p 8302:8302 -p 8302:8302/udp -p 8400:8400 -p 8500:8500 progrium/consul -server -bootstrap
sudo docker run -d -p 2376:2376  swarm manage -H :2376 --strategy spread --replication --advertise @@{private_ip_address}@@:2376 consul://@@{private_ip_address}@@:8500 
docker network create --driver overlay --subnet=@@{network_subnet}@@ @@{network_name}@@
fi
tasks.name: ConfigureMaster

tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash
if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" != "0" ];then
sudo docker run -d  swarm join --addr=@@{private_ip_address}@@:2375 consul://@@{calm_array_private_ip_address[0]}@@:8500
fi
tasks.name: ConfigureSlaves

tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash
if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "1" ];then

sudo mkdir -p /etc/haproxy
sudo sh -c 'echo "global
    maxconn 2000
    pidfile /var/run/haproxy.pid
    log     127.0.0.1 local0
    log     127.0.0.1 local1 notice

    # echo "" | nc -U /var/run/haproxy.sock
    stats   socket /var/run/haproxy.sock mode 777

resolvers docker

defaults
    log         global
    mode        http
    option      dontlognull
    option      forwardfor
    option      httpclose
    option      httplog
    retries     3
    timeout     check    5s
    timeout     client   5s
    timeout     connect  10s
    timeout     server   10s

frontend web
  bind   *:80
  mode   http
  option http-server-close
  option forceclose
  default_backend application-backend


backend application-backend


listen stats
    bind *:9000
    mode http

    #This is the virtual URL to access the stats page
    stats uri /haproxy_stats

    #Authentication realm. This can be set to anything. Escape space characters with a backslash.
    stats realm HAProxy\ Statistics

    #The user/pass you want to use. Change this password!
    stats auth admin:admin

    #This allows you to take down and bring up back end servers.
    #This will produce an error on older versions of HAProxy.
    stats admin if TRUE" > /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg.tmpl'

sudo cp /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg.tmpl /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

IFS=$':'

for application_container in $(echo @@{application_containers}@@ | sed "s/,/:/g"); do 
	container_name=${application_container#'/'} 
    sudo sed -i '35i \    server '"$container_name"' '"$container_name"':80 check resolvers docker resolve-prefer ipv4' /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg ;
done

fi
tasks.name: Create haproxy template
update haproxy

tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash

if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ];then

docker -H tcp://@@{DOCKER_IP}@@:2376 kill -s HUP calm_@@{calm_deployment_name}@@_haproxy

fi
tasks.name: reload haproxy
update haproxy

tasks.script:
#!/bin/bash

if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ];then

docker -H tcp://@@{DOCKER_IP}@@:2376 kill -s HUP calm_@@{calm_deployment_name}@@_haproxy

fi
tasks.name: reload haproxy
